abstract: H.P.’s incoming chairman defended the company’s new chief executive, Leo Apotheker, despite an intellectual property lawsuit filed by Oracle against his former employer, SAP.
snippet: H.P.’s incoming chairman defended the company’s new chief executive, Leo Apotheker, despite an intellectual property lawsuit filed by Oracle against his former employer, SAP.
lead_paragraph: Hewlett-Packard‘s incoming chairman on Monday defended the company’s hiring of Léo Apotheker as its chief executive, after taking heat from DealBook colleague Joe Nocera’s most recent column.
